workspace_form.title: Set up your team workspace
workspace_form.description: Organize your committees and response teams in dedicated workspaces
workspace_form.name_description: This is the name of your committee or response team.
workspace_form.description_placeholder: Describe your committee or team's role here
workspace_form.description_description: Describe your workspace so your committee or team knows its purpose

delete_workspace_form.title: Delete Workspace
delete_workspace_form.description: Deleting a workspace is permanent and cannot be undone. All associated data will be removed.
delete_workspace_form.confirm_description: Are you sure you want to delete? This action cannot be undone.

members.title: Members

members.member_description: Can view and edit only tasks created by them.
members.error_change_role: Error occurred while changing member's role
